name: Flaming Backfire Rebirth From The Ashes
name_original: Flaming Backfire Rebirth From The Ashes
description:
Flaming Backfire: Rebirth From The Ashes is an arcade-style vertical shoot 'em-up game where you play as an immortal phoenix blasting through whatever gets in its way. The Phoenix will fight against enemies who will try to take it down! But as the Phoenix eliminates them it becomes stronger and stronger every time it is reborn from the ashes! Will you join the Phoenix adventure and let it fly freely in the sky? Challenge yourself now!

https://www.vecteezy.com/vector-art/11484043-pixel-art-keyboard-arrow-keys-keyboard-play-keys-vector-icon-for-8bit-game-on-white-background

Arrow key asset by Kalebsilva
